description:
Our eclectic apartment is a cozy and comfortable studio apartment in Brooklyn's East Flatbush neighborhood. Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Prospect Park are a 10 min. drive. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers. Public transportation only a 5 minute walk.

Studio - queen size bed
Living/Dining Area with TV
Kitchen
Bathroom w/ tub
Air mattress available - queen size
Crib available
name: Modern Studio / Ground Floor
review: Danilda is a great host and truly goes out of her way to make you feel at home! However, note about this basement apt: for those that are sensitive to noise - you can hear a lot of what is going on on the upper level (footsteps etc), and the pipes can be loud.
